title: How to write the numbers 1 million, and 1 billion - Quora

response.answer_text: 1,000 = 1 thousand 1,000,000 = 1 million 1,000,000,000 = 1 billion 1,000,000,000,000 = 1 trillion 1,000,000,000,000,000 = quadrillion Next is quintilion, then sex… sept… oct… non… and decillion, beyond that just look it up. Bc i don’t know Every time you add three zeros, (same as multiplying by 1000), you move up to next (magnatude name,,, idk what to call this) Hope this helps!
As a C-programmer: 1e6 and 1e9. Or for physical units: 1M and 1G (as in mega- and giga-tons). Or for accountants: 1,000,000 and 1,000,000,000.
